frontmatter.description: The world is ready to move forward with consequences set aside. Find the right ways to push the extents of others' beliefs by being more impactful than forceful.
frontmatter.title: Push extents

frontmatter.description: The approach to the pandemic is changing over time, rather than as a response to new methods or protocols. It's a frustrating situation for everyone and the individual approaches will vary more widely moving forward.
frontmatter.title: Adjusting approach

frontmatter.description: We are heading into an unknown and it won't help if the path is equally bumpy for all. Look to smooth the path for others where possible because it will benefit everyone.
frontmatter.title: Smooth the path

frontmatter.description: Relationships take a lot of work and much good fortune. It's worth the effort, and those efforts and luck deserves celebration.
frontmatter.title: A decade stronger

frontmatter.description: Find ways to be more effective with time and avoid simply spinning tires in the sand. Take a better approach rather than digging too far.
frontmatter.title: Spinning wheels in the sand

frontmatter.description: Big gains feel unlikely in the current environment. String together small incremental gains for happiness and effectiveness. Incremental gains eventually lead to step change.
frontmatter.title: Incremental gains

frontmatter.description: Spend more on the little things that bring small wins. Many of the big wins are gone for now. No travel, no events, no dinners out with friends.
frontmatter.title: Small wins repeated

frontmatter.description: Create time for independence through the right used of focused time and efforts.
frontmatter.title: Independence and connection

frontmatter.description: Much has been lost in terms of quality of life. This cannot become the new standard. Strive for even better than before.
frontmatter.title: Quality of life loss normalization

frontmatter.description: Everyone is consumed by more than what's on the surface. Every interaction in influenced by any number of unknown past experiences.
frontmatter.title: Mindfully rational
